title: 4 Types of Negative People & 3 Ways to Deal With Them
description: We all have friends that we love but are absolutely draining to talk to. Every time they call you, you know exactly what you’re in for.  No matter how hard we try to optimize for the optimistic, negative people will always be a part of each of our lives and that’s okay.  In this episode, we take a look at the 4 different types of negative people and 3 ways to proactively deal with them.
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
